code: import React,{useContext,useState}from"react";import Item from"./Item";import{ListDetailContext}from"../../providers/ListDetailProvider";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ItemOverview(){const{list,changeItem,deleteItem}=useContext(ListDetailContext);const[itemFilter,setItemFilter]=useState(true);const handleFilter=()=>{setItemFilter(prevState=>!prevState);};const filteredItems=itemFilter===false?list.items:list.items.filter(item=>!item.checked);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-dropdown",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"dropdown-item",onClick:()=>handleFilter(),children:[itemFilter?"Missing":"All"," items:"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-overview",children:filteredItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Item,{item:item,changeItem:changeItem,deleteItem:deleteItem},item.id))})]});}export default ItemOverview;
